content: this is a free fan-made amigurumi pattern to make a chibi-styled amigurumi of sylveon the finished amigurumi should measure approximately 9 inches tall size may vary depending on yarn type and personal yarn gauge you will want to use a 4 0mm hook or smaller colors needed red heart super saver -soft white -light raspberry -periwinkle blue -light blue felt colors needed -light blue -white
